Summary: "Internet Explorer cannot open the Internet site ... Operation aborted" when choosing Multiple Choice question type IE6/IE7
Description:
When creating an assessment, on the edit assessment page (the "Preview | Publish | Settings" page), if you select "Multiple Choice" from the Add Question drop down menu, a pop up appears in Internet Explorer 7 on Vista or IE6 on XP. 

I could not reproduce this in IE8 or in any other browsers.
Creator: Michael "Maka" Gradin

Comments.Author: Lydia Li
Comments.Comment: Is this related to SAM-816?  Can you test in 2.7.0-b03 or later and see if this problem still exists?

Comments.Author: Michael "Maka" Gradin
Comments.Comment:
Hello.

I re-tested this on two servers with 2.7.0-b06, both with XP/IE6 and Vista/IE7, and I no longer get the popup error reported above.

Looks good.

(sorry about the delay in responding)

Comments.Author: Sam Ottenhoff
Comments.Comment: If there were no Subversion commits related to this JIRA, can you please close this as Resolution: Incorporated instead of Resolution: Fixed?
